name: To the Well and Back
description:
In the village of There their beloved fountain has run dry.

You must traverse the harsh landscape, learning new skills, and picking up missing map pieces to reach the well in the village of There.

But once you make it to the well you must, of course, return to Back to get their fountain running again.

Controls:

- Movement: A/D or Left/Right Arrows

- Jump: Space

- Dash: Shift

- Flux: Q

Credits:

Developed in one week for the VimJam game jame by:

- Adam Fowler

- Matt Bolivar
